tp.pr4.control

Class GravityFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr4.control.GravityFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameTypeFactory

    public class GravityFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameTypeFactory
    Implementation of the factory for Gravity. The methods return the objects capable of playing this game. Given that the size of the Gravity board is not fixed, the factory is parameterised by the board size.
    Since:
    Assignment 3

      • createMove

        public Move createMove(int col,
              int row,
              Counter colour)
        Description copied from interface: GameTypeFactory
        Constructs a move for a particular game. A given implementation may not use all the parameters.
        Specified by:
        createMove in interface GameTypeFactory
        Parameters:
        col - Column where the counter is to be placed.
        row - Row where the counter is to be placed (not used in C4 or Complica).
        colour - Colour of the counter to be placed.
        Returns:
        Move object capable of executing the move for a given type of game.

        Specified by:
        createHumanPlayerAtConsole in interface GameTypeFactory
        Parameters:
        in - Input scanner that the player will use to ask the user.
        Returns:
        Player object that will be used to ask the user for the next command to be executed.
